Text.val: Author: Martin Wenta (MW)
Status: Ok
This program allows the "Confidential" client to enter the status information of
the file which was just uploaded. It can be activated with a link on ICA501.
It can be also activate ICA505 automatically if the user selects option
option "All outstanding invoices" after the upload
04.07.2012 AS SCR#17412 Always call ICA505_IC when GNRL_CODE=PL
12.04.2010 GB SCR15456 Extended condition for selection ICPH
14.09.2009 AS SCR#13620 added handling for invalid session
04.01.2009 CHP SCR#14176 Integrate Link to Call Programm ICA505_IC
02.12.2008 CHP SCR#14083 Now Search in Selected Client/Admin instead of all allo
wed clients during check CLDB
02.12.2008 CHP SCR#14083 Changed Date to Last 30 (Before 60)
02.12.2008 CHP SCR#14176 remove GSET166
02.05.2008 AK SCR13587 removed '(' and ')' form name in 'merge allowed Clients'
13.08.2007 CHP SCR12788 Until date may not be empty for Intercredit Clients
14.06.2007 AK SCR12630 added intercredit clients to task 'merge combo'
24.05.2007 AK SCR12573 change the way bankaccount are compared in 'check CLBD'
15.09.2006 AK SCR11885 bug fix
18.04.2006 SCR#10979 CHP Fixed Currency Problem
Needed to rebuild the site, if another client was selected
18.04.2006 SCR#10979 CHP Fixed Currency Problem
If no row available
Fixed Problem, if CADI_NO=0, condition added
Select all distinct ICPH if CAPI not available
If CAPI available

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT ICPH.ICPH_BANK_ADMNO, ICPH.ICPH_BANK_LEDG_NO,ICPH.ICPH_BANKID, ICPH.ICPH_BANKACCOUNT FROM :1 WHERE ICPH.ICPH_ADMNO=:2 AND ICPH.ICPH_CLNTNO=:3 AND ICPH.ICPH_ROWTYPE=1 AND ICPH_BANKACCOUNT <> '' AND ICPH.ICPH_BOOKINGDATE>':4' FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: If no rows available

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select CLBD310_ADMNO, CLBD310_CLNTNO, CLBD310_BANKID, CLBD310_BANKACCOUNT from :1/clbD
where CLBD310_ADMNO=:2 and CLBD310_CLNTNO=:3 and CLBD310_BANKID= :4 and CLBD310_BANKACCOUNT like '%:5%'
